details.title: Motion error correction of range migration algorithm for aircraft spotlight SAR imaging
details.abstract: Since a motion error is the main phase error source in the aircraft synthetic aperture radar, several reconstruction algorithms with motion error correction have been developed. An efficient motion compensation via the known motion error information is proposed. Specifically, the proposed method is based on the subarea technique with shifting and the subaperture technique via the mean values of the motion errors. Then, using the extended Taylor approximation and the principle of the stationary phase, the motion errors are corrected through compensation at the mixing stage and the Stolt interpolation stage.

ieee.title: Omega-k Algorithm for Airborne Spatial Invariant Bistatic Spotlight SAR Imaging
ieee.displayText: Hee-Sub Shin, Jong-Tae Lim, "Omega-k Algorithm for Airborne Spatial Invariant Bistatic Spotlight SAR Imaging", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 47, pp. 238-250, 2009, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Adaptive Pulse Regulations to Achieve High Range Resolution within the Unambiguous Window
ieee.displayText: Bin Li, Shanguo Huang, Wanyi Gu, Yunxiao Zu, "Adaptive Pulse Regulations to Achieve High Range Resolution within the Unambiguous Window", Wireless Communications Networking and Mobile Computing 2009. WiCom '09. 5th International Conference on, pp. 1-4, 2009.

ieee.title: Omega-k Algorithm for Airborne Forward-Looking Bistatic Spotlight SAR Imaging
ieee.displayText: Hee-Sub Shin, Jong-Tae Lim, "Omega-k Algorithm for Airborne Forward-Looking Bistatic Spotlight SAR Imaging", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters IEEE, vol. 6, pp. 312-316, 2009, ISSN 1545-598X.

ieee.title: An improved nonlinear chirp scaling algorithm with capability motion compensation for one-stationary BiSAR
ieee.displayText: Chundong Qi, Tao Zeng, Feng Li, "An improved nonlinear chirp scaling algorithm with capability motion compensation for one-stationary BiSAR", Signal Processing (ICSP) 2010 IEEE 10th International Conference on, pp. 2035-2038, 2010.

ieee.title: An improved chirp scaling algorithm with capability motion compensation for SAR
ieee.displayText: Chundong Qi, Tao Zeng, Feng Li, Liang Chen, "An improved chirp scaling algorithm with capability motion compensation for SAR", Signal Processing Systems (ICSPS) 2010 2nd International Conference on, vol. 3, pp. V3-234-V3-236, 2010.

ieee.title: Spotlight SAR images restoration based on tomography model
ieee.displayText: Zhenming Peng, Hongbing Wang, Guo Zhang, Shiying Yang, "Spotlight SAR images restoration based on tomography model", Synthetic Aperture Radar 2009. APSAR 2009. 2nd Asian-Pacific Conference on, pp. 1060-1063, 2009.

ieee.title: Two-step motion compensation of range migration algorithm for airborne spotlight SAR imaging
